thread.title: Verizon to raise price of grandfathered unlimited data plan by $20 for those not under contract
thread.title_full: Verizon to raise price of grandfathered unlimited data plan by $20 for those not under contract

title: Verizon to raise price of grandfathered unlimited data plan by $20 for those not under contract
text:
Verizon to raise price of grandfathered unlimited data plan by $20 for those not under contract 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
Verizon may soon be raising the price of its unlimited data plan for those who are grandfathered in if they are not under contract anymore. ...
